section.title: vendors master list of Vendors
section.para: The Vendors screen lists all your company's vendors. In addition, the screen can be used to generate vendor reports. Here are some tips for using this screen:

listitem.para: Use the right-click menu to edit a vendor in the list.
When exporting information, be sure to activate all the column headers you want to include in your export file. Many of these columns may be hidden by default.
The search filter options can help you build common searches for later use.

tip.para: The address information displayed on this screen reflects the address for the vendor's primary contact. This may not be the same as the business address listed on the vendor's CRM account.
